name: Moses: The Exodus
overview: Moses: The Exodus is a an educational title for children in which they learn about the classic story from the old Testament. Aside from the actual story, it comes with some games, more information about the time frame in which the story takes place, scripture from the Bible and a play room. The main game is a point-and-click adventure game in which you explore the insides of a pyramid. You have to find your way around and interact with characters inside the pyramid that help you. The play room features sing along songs, connect the dots, a sliding puzzle and a coloring book.
